name: All My Urchins & Cloud City Celebration
Text: 'Deploy on Table. If Independent Operation on table, and all your ability is provided by Leia, Luke, aliens, Cloud Cars, and [Independent] starship pilots: Cloud City Troopers ignore location deployment restrictions (and ''power -1'') in their game text; immunity to attrition of opponent''s characters and starships at Bespin locations is limited to < 6; your total battle destiny is +1 (+2 if your trooper in battle); and you retrieve 2 Force whenever you initiate battle. Place on Bottom of Force Pile if canceled.',
